stimulusHtml: Although Elisabeth Louise Vigée Le Brun’s Self-Portrait (1790) and Miguel Cabrera’s Portrait of Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz (circa 1750) both depict women, Vigée Le Brun’s painting differs from the earlier work by depicting its subject
choicesHtml: as a confident and well-educated individual
in a less realistic, more stylized manner
in the dress of a Classical heroine
in a more informal, natural posture
